message_1: What is the balanced chemical equation for the double replacement reaction between sodium hydroxide (NaOH) and hydrochloric acid (HCl)?
message_2:
The balanced chemical equation for the double replacement reaction between sodium hydroxide (NaOH) and hydrochloric acid (HCl) is:

NaOH(aq) + HCl(aq) â†’ NaCl(aq) + H2O(l)
